code: import{useState}from'react';import{doSignInWithEmailAndPassword}from'../firebase/auth';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginForm=()=>{const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[activeLbl,setActiveLbl]=useState("");const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const handleSignInClick=()=>{if(password!==""&&email!==""){doSignInWithEmailAndPassword(email,password);}else{setActiveLbl("all");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"login",onKeyDown:e=>{if(e.key==="Enter")handleSignInClick();},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"email",value:email,placeholder:"email adress",onFocus:()=>setActiveLbl(""),onChange:event=>{setEmail(event.target.value);}}),activeLbl==="all"&&email===""?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"password",children:"This field cannot be empty"}):"",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",className:"password",value:password,placeholder:"password",onFocus:()=>setActiveLbl(""),onChange:event=>{setPassword(event.target.value);}}),activeLbl==="all"&&password===""?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"password",children:"This field cannot be empty"}):"",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{type:"submit",onClick:handleSignInClick,children:"Sign In"})]});};export default LoginForm;
